(Sorry I didn't reply sooner, Netscape wouldn't let me e-mail.)

Tavatron:

Tavatron snarled under her breath, this was just great. Of all the things 
they could be doing now the last thing she desired to do was make a fool of 
herself in front of a fellow warrior. Especially a warrior such as Dinobot. 
He could easily run down any prey he desired, that she was sure of. She 
couldn't even trail a rabbit.

Tavatron sighed and kept on walking, there was nothing she could do about it 
now, she had slready agreed to the hunt. Tavatron took a mental note of her 
surroundings, scattered trees, a few boulders, mostly dirt and grass. It was 
always important to know one's surroundings. To their left, however, lay a 
beautiful forest, one she had visited many times before.

Tavatron sighed inwardly, a single thought crossing her mind, *it's now or 
never...*:

"The hunting ground I spoke of lies beyond those trees, in the forest." 
Tavatron indicated the forest with her paw. An odd feeling hovered in the 
back of her mind as she walked towards it. She shook her head but the 
feeling lingered.

As Tavatron neared the forest she finally realized what it was... fear. She 
was afraid to make a fool of herself in front of Dinobot. Tavatron growled 
in annoyance, now was not the time to let her emotions get the better of 
her.
